name: Jeep Car Stunt Tricks Pro
description:
Enjoy the crazy stunts on jeep prado tricks master, there are real crazy racing adventures on the extreme Uphill offroad impossible highway tracks. Be the best racer of the year 2018 with Jeep Car Stunt Tricks Pro. Experience the real challenge race of impossible modern vehicle as a best real racer of the year 2018. As a jeep prado racer you will perform drive stunts on the challenging tracks and become an expert racing stunt master on the realistic impossible ramps.
1. Easy and smooth controls for jeep stunts
2. Crazy and super real stunt challenges
3. Various checkpoints to cross and start from the previous checkpoint after the failure
4. Be an extreme racer and stunt master by installing this 3D game play
5. Enjoy the crazy ride of monster jeep vehicles
